analysis.key_quote: Destroying this system is not just unnecessary - the ability to guide the government is based on the skill of political leaders - but also actively harmful to the balance of power between the executive and the judicial/legislative branch and our system of government.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service and expressing concerns about the potential harm to the balance of power and governance, which aligns with themes of politicization and the integrity of the civil service.
